content: *all my designs are free to download if you enjoy them please consider making a donation to your local humane society or animal care organization * a narrow scarf / neck warmer knit in one piece from end to end uses aran weight yarn and 6mm needles finished measurements are approximately 13 x 75 blocked enjoy please note this pattern is designed for aran weight yarn if you would prefer to knit minnie in sport weight yarn please use ** this version 1 ** of the pattern thanks 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/minnie-sport-weight
